alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 9:20AM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow will affect Aroostook and north central Penobscot Counties... At 915 AM EDT...An area of heavy snow extended across eastern Aroostook County...moving northeast AT 20 MPH. Locations impacted include... Presque Isle, Caribou, Houlton, Fort Kent, Madawaska, Fort Fairfield, Limestone, Van Buren, Patten, Eagle Lake, Portage, Mapleton, Washburn, Mars Hill, Medway, Hodgdon, Ashland, Easton, Woodland and Frenchville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 95 between mile markers 248 and 304. US Highway 1 between Orient and Fort Kent. State Highway 11 between Stacyville and Fort Kent. * Visibilities will drop quickly to a quarter mile in this area of heavy snow. * Snowfall rates of over an 1 inch per hour are possible in this area of heavy snow.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook
